description: A paginated call to get a list of all custom line item versions.

parameters.name: Arn
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for the custom line item.

parameters.name: Filters
parameters.description: A ListCustomLineItemVersionsFilter that specifies the billing period range in which the custom line item versions are applied. BillingPeriodRange (dict) --- The billing period range in which the custom line item version is applied. StartBillingPeriod (string) --- The inclusive start billing period that defines a billing period range where a custom line item version is applied. EndBillingPeriod (string) --- The exclusive end billing period that defines a billing period range where a custom line item version is applied.

nested_params.name: BillingPeriodRange
nested_params.description: The billing period range in which the custom line item version is applied.

nested_params.name: StartBillingPeriod
nested_params.description: The inclusive start billing period that defines a billing period range where a custom line item version is applied.

nested_params.name: EndBillingPeriod
nested_params.description: The exclusive end billing period that defines a billing period range where a custom line item version is applied.

nested_items.name: CustomLineItemVersions
nested_items.description: A list of CustomLineItemVersionListElements that are received.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: The name of the custom line item.

nested_items.name: ChargeDetails
nested_items.description: A representation of the charge details of a custom line item.

nested_items.name: ChargeValue
nested_items.description: The custom line item's fixed charge value in USD.

nested_items.name: Percentage
nested_items.description: A ListCustomLineItemPercentageChargeDetails that describes the charge details of a percentage custom line item.

nested_items.name: PercentageValue
nested_items.description: The custom line item's percentage value. This will be multiplied against the combined value of its associated resources to determine its charge value.

nested_items.name: Type
nested_items.description: The type of the custom line item that indicates whether the charge is a fee or credit.

nested_items.name: LineItemFilters
nested_items.description: A representation of the line item filter.

nested_items.name: Attribute
nested_items.description: The attribute of the line item filter. This specifies what attribute that you can filter on.

nested_items.name: MatchOption
nested_items.description: The match criteria of the line item filter. This parameter specifies whether not to include the resource value from the billing group total cost.

nested_items.name: Values
nested_items.description: The values of the line item filter. This specifies the values to filter on. Currently, you can only exclude Savings Plan discounts.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: CurrencyCode
nested_items.description: The charge value currency of the custom line item.

nested_items.name: Description
nested_items.description: The description of the custom line item.

nested_items.name: ProductCode
nested_items.description: The product code that's associated with the custom line item.

nested_items.name: BillingGroupArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the billing group that the custom line item applies to.

nested_items.name: CreationTime
nested_items.description: The time when the custom line item version was created.

nested_items.name: LastModifiedTime
nested_items.description: The most recent time that the custom line item version was modified.

nested_items.name: AssociationSize
nested_items.description: The number of resources that are associated with the custom line item.

nested_items.name: StartBillingPeriod
nested_items.description: The start billing period of the custom line item version.

nested_items.name: EndBillingPeriod
nested_items.description: The end billing period of the custom line item version.

nested_items.name: Arn
nested_items.description: A list of custom line item Amazon Resource Names (ARNs) to retrieve information.

nested_items.name: StartTime
nested_items.description: The inclusive start time.

nested_items.name: AccountId
nested_items.description: The Amazon Web Services account in which this custom line item will be applied to.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: The pagination token that's used on subsequent calls to retrieve custom line item versions.
